link.title: CEC 2 | Community Education Council District 2 | NYC

meta.content: CEC 2 | Community Education Council District 2 | NYC

span.span: May CEC D2 Calendar Zoom Meeting
If you cannot attend the meeting you may send comments on any topic of interest to cec2@schools.nyc.gov
April CEC D2 Working Business Zoom Meeting

p.span: 1. Updates from council members on Remote Learning efforts
3. Discussion of CEC D2 recommendations for 2020 admissions process
4. Discussion of how best to advocate for parents and families during social isolation and how to best organize CEC efforts during social isolation

span.span: April CEC D2 Calendar Zoom Meeting
If you cannot attend the meeting you may send comments on any topic of interest to cec2@schools.nyc.gov
NYC DOE Resources and Updates as of 3.30.20

p.span: Visit neighbors.columbia.edu/K12StudentNeeds to join the virtual town hall.
Dr. Roberta Lenger Kang, Director of the Center of Professional Education of Teachers, Teachers College
Deirdre McIntosh-Brown, Co-Chair of Manhattan Community Board 9's Youth, Education and Libraries Committee
Dr. Detra Price-Dennis, Associate Professor of Education, Teachers College
Marisol Rosales, Executive Superintendent for Manhattan, NYC Department of Education
Moderated by Manhattan Borough President Gale Brewer

span.span: CEC D2 Calendar and Working Business Meeting

p.span: If you wish to join with video, you do need to download Zoom. However, if you don’t want to download Zoom, you can join the call through the dial in number. The dial in option is voice only, no video.

span.span: The CEC will be reviewing and voting on the following 3 resolutions and 1 letter:
1) Draft Resolution On Using Attendance and Punctuality as an Admission Metric for Middle School
2) Draft Resolution on Including Course Grade and APBC Grade Data in DOE “Info Hub”
3) Draft Resolution on Enhancements to the Middle and High School Matching Process
If you cannot attend the meeting you may send comments on any topic of interest to cec2@schools.nyc.gov
D2 TOWN HALL MEETING WITH THE CHANCELLOR IS POSTPONED
CEC D2 Traffic Forum co-sponsored by Senator Hoylman
Tentative Location: Quest to Learn-351 West 18th Street
April CEC D2 Calendar and Working Business Meeting
CEC D2 Joint Diversity & Screening meeting
D2 and D2 NYSIP Joint meeting
Click here for Dr. Fergus Presentation
Any questions, email cec2@schools.nyc.gov and write on the subject line "D2 NYSIP"
Working Business meeting following Joint meeting
February CEC D2 Calendar and Working Business Meeting

a.span: Resolution in Support of French Dual Language Program at the 76th Street Pre-K Center

span.span: If you cannot attend the meeting you may send comments on any topic of interest to cec2@schools.nyc.gov
Febrero Consejo de Educación Comunitaria de el Distrito 2 (CEC D2)
Si no puede ir a la reunión, puede enviar comentarios sobre cualquier tema de interés a
CEC D2 and D2 NYSIP Joint meeting
CEC D2 TOWN HALL MEETING WITH THE CHANCELLOR

The Chancellor will be taking questions! You can submit a question by emailing CEC2@schools.nyc.gov and putting 'Question for the Chancellor' in the subject line. Comment cards will also be distributed at the Town Hall.
D2 Students with Disabilities Forum Discussion
January CEC D2 Calendar and Working Business Meeting
If you cannot attend the meeting you may send comments on any topic of interest to cec2@schools.nyc.gov

Robert F. Wagner Middle School- Biblioteca

NYC Community School District 2 - New York State Integration Pilot
If you cannot attend the meeting you may send comments on any topic of interest to cec2@schools.nyc.gov

Support of the Creation of a DOE Public School Program for
Dyslexic Students at the Bleecker School Site
If you cannot attend the meeting you may send comments on any topic of interest to cec2@schools.nyc.gov

Si no puede ir a la reunión, puede enviar comentarios sobre cualquier tema de interés a

div.p: 十月份第二學區教育委員會的會議
如果您無法參加會議，您可以將感興趣的任何主題和評論發送至 cec2@schools.nyc.gov。

span.span: September CEC D2 Calendar and Working Business Meeting
If you cannot attend the meeting you may send comments on any topic of interest to cec2@schools.nyc.gov
Septiembre Consejo de Educación Comunitaria de el Distrito 2 (CEC D2)
Si no puede ir a la reunión, puede enviar comentarios sobre cualquier tema de interés a
2019 年 9 月 11 日 CEC D2 例行及事務會議
地點：The Clinton School 10 East 15th Street
August CEC D2 Calendar and Working Business Meeting
If you cannot attend the meeting you may send comments on any topic of interest to cec2@schools.nyc.gov
Consejo de Educación Comunitaria de el Distrito 2 (CEC D2)
Sala de conferencias en el séptimo piso
Si no puede ir a la reunión, puede enviar comentarios sobre cualquier tema de interés a
Panel for Educational Policies (PEP) July monthly meeting
M.S. 131 (100 Hester St. New York, NY 10002)
They will be discussing the CRSE proposal
Click on agenda for more details.
July CEC D2 Annual, Calendar and Working Business Meeting
Consejo de Educación Comunitaria de el Distrito 2 (CEC D2)
Sala de conferencias en el séptimo piso
Si no puede ir a la reunión, puede enviar comentarios sobre cualquier tema de interés a
Welcome our new 2019-2021 CEC D2 Council Members
Bienvenidos a nuestros nuevos miembros del Consejo 2019-2021 CEC D2
We are pleased to welcome the new CEC members for the 2019-2021 council term.
The Community Education Council election results are posted here.
Nos complace dar la bienvenida a los nuevos miembros de la CEC para el período del consejo 2019-2021.
Los resultados de las elecciones del Consejo de Educación de la Comunidad se publican aquí.
June CEC D2 Calendar and Working Business Meeting
If you cannot attend the meeting you may send comments on any topic of interest to info@cecd2.net.
Junio Consejo de Educación Comunitaria de el Distrito 2 (CEC D2)
Si no puede ir a la reunión, puede enviar comentarios sobre cualquier tema de interés a info@cecd2.net.
District 2 & District 3 - Joint Multilingual Committee Meeting

div.p: The next Multilingual Committee meeting will be a joint District 2 & District 3 meeting.
Update on the Multilingual Working Group discussions.
Talking about challenges and obstacles our DL (Dual Language) programs face, and possible solutions.
Any questions, please email: mmaron@cecd2.net, acheung@cecd2.net or lliu@cec3.org
La próxima reunión del Comité Multilingüe será una reunión conjunta del Distrito 2 y del Distrito 3.

span.span: Lugar: La biblioteca de la escuela de Clinton

div.p: Actualización sobre las discusiones del Grupo de Trabajo Multilingüe.
Hablamos de desafíos y obstáculos que enfrentan nuestros programas de lenguaje dual y posibles soluciones.
Cualquier pregunta, escribe al correo electrónico: mmaron@cecd2.net, acheung@cecd2.net y lliu@cec3.org

span.span: Response letters and Presentation from May 9th Calendar meeting:
CEC2 5/15/19 Letter response from Office of Enrollment
CEC2 Letter with the Short Term Requests
The May & June CECD2 Calendar and Working Business Meetings will take place on Thursday, May 9th and Thursday, June 13, 2019

p.span: The May and June CECD2 Calendar and Working Business Meetings will take place on:

span.span: Thursday, May 9th, 6:30pm at (new location) PS 41-116 West 11th Street,
Thursday, June 13th, 6:30pm at 333 Seventh Avenue in the 7th Floor

div.p: On our May 9th, 2019 Calendar meeting we will be discussing the recent admissions errors in D2 and there will be representatives from Enrollment, Space Planning and D2 administration.

p.span: We will also vote on the following resolution:

span.span: Resolution urging City Council to fund class size reduction

p.span: See attached enrollment letter mentioned in the Agenda and Screening Committee letter:

div.p: Please join CEC D2 Screening Committee to discuss the District 2 HS admissions errors and related concerns regarding the High School matching process. Wednesday, April 17th 6:30pm at P.S. 340 located at 64 West 17th Street. We will be joined by representatives from the DOE Office of Enrollment and the Manhattan Superintendent's Office.

span.a: CEC letter to Office of Enrollment concerning 2019 Lab HS placement offers

span.span: Join our mailing list for meeting notices and other news:

p.span: All CEC meetings are open to the public and provide opportunities for public comments. We look forward to hearing from you at our next meeting!
Click the "Who Represents Me" button and enter your home address for an updated list of NY City and State elected officials and their contact information.
